Tags: British Columbia , canada , clean transportation , clean transportation news , clean vehicles , David Adams , electric vehicles , fuel cell vehicles , Global Automakers of Canada , hydrogen fuel Canadian rebate program supporting clean vehicles is beginning to run out of money Clean vehicles may lose some support in British Columbia, Canada, in the coming months as the province’s rebate program begins to run out of money.
